aligning_state.h
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 #include "unicorn/state.h"
2 
3 /* State description:
4  The ALIGNING state is instansiated when a goal has been reached, alt has been issued manually.
5  1. Align the robot so it stands perpendicular with the refuse bin
6  2. Exit state with new state set to REVERSING
7  2 alt. if abort message was recieved exit with new state set to IDLE
8 */
9
